NetSparkleUpdater.​Downloaders.​WebClientFileDownloader
NetSparkleUpdater.​Interfaces.​IUpdateDownloader
IDisposable
public
NetSparkleUpdater.​Downloaders.​WebClientFileDownloader

Class that downloads files from the internet and reports progress on those files being downloaded. Uses a object as its main method for downloading.
